title: I wasted my money on a rumble skin, and I got bored of him, wut do I do?

replies.body: you give rumble a second chance, a yordle is not just for Christmas mate.

>
> Got refund credits? If not, 2 bad m9

he already answered that question you retard.
Rumble has been a viable top/mid since forever. He is worth learning properly, if you do learn him properly you will never get bored of him.
Lie down, Try not to cry, Cry alot
assassin meta coming up, still viable?
at least hes strong in the meta right now. play him while hes strong instead of getting rekt on your assassins in this tank meta
